page.title: 07FUTURE PLANS/HORNDEAN C.PARK
page.content: The Country Park Interpreter feels that, with so many activities already established in the park,it is time to expand its use in other directions, perhaps into music,theatre and exhibitions of painting and sculpture. The large patio outside the Centre could be used for open air productions and concerts.The video/lecture theatre could also be used.December 1985 will see the second carol concert staged in the centre.The Interpreter wants to encourage local groups and clubs to use the Centre for some of their meetings.He feels that,in this way,a wider cross section of the community would come to know and love the countryside and realise the need for its conservation.
